content.question: ​In the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane, the terminal ray of an angle in standard position intersects the unit circle at point <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following is true about the cosine of the angle, as the angle measure increases from <math alttext="0"><semantics><mn>0</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> to <math alttext="pi"><semantics><mi>π</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​The cosine of the angle decreases then increases, because the horizontal displacement of <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> from the <math alttext="y"><semantics><mi>y</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-axis decreases, then increases over the interval.

​​The cosine of the angle decreases, because the horizontal displacement of <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> from the <math alttext="y"><semantics><mi>y</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-axis decreases over the entire interval.

​​The cosine of the angle increases, then decreases, because the vertical displacement of <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> from the <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-axis increases, then decreases over the interval.

​​​The cosine of the angle decreases, because the vertical displacement of <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> from the <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-axis decreases over the entire interval.
